channel.title: Flash Games to Kill Some Time
channel.description:
Hey guys. Haven't found a thread focused on a topic like this, so here goes..
We've all come across a time where we try and shave off an hour or two on flash games. Whether it be because rig exploded, and all you have left is a shitty lappy, or you're at your grandmas house and you're forced to trying to make her Windows ME entertain you. Flash games are a great way to kill some time when you don't have your face fixated on an "OMGWTFBBQ graphiczz R gud" game.
So go ahead and share your favorite flash games here, friends. Help your fellow BMS fans kill some time :retard: (URL's are recommended)

item.title: Flash Games to Kill Some Time
item.dc:creator: Shinobi
item.description:
https://armorgames.com/play/10572/rebuild

Zombie apocalypse has taken over your town, you have to take it back. Like Civilization, but with zombies on all sides. Easily my favorite flash game.
